spas - package spas
Java-classes used in SPAS.

Contains different classes for handling elements gotten from spas.nhandling.nelements - package spas.nhandling.nelements
Contains classes for object-representation of elements gotten from spas.taglib - package spas.taglib
Package containing the custom tag-classes for usage in SPAS.
spas.taglib.handlers - package spas.taglib.handlers
Contains custom tag classes for handling forms.
spas.taglib.printers - package spas.taglib.printers
Contains custom tag classes for printing.
spas.usercontrol - package spas.usercontrol
Containcs classes for user-based coursehandling, user information editing and validation.
